Description: Google is a global technology company specializing in Internet-related services and products. It offers services such as search, online advertising, cloud computing, and software.
Apple Inc. designs and sells consumer electronics, software, and online services. It is renowned for its iPhone, iPad, and Mac computers.
Microsoft Corporation develops, manufactures, licenses, and supports a wide range of software products, including Windows, Office, and Azure cloud services.
Amazon is an e-commerce and cloud computing giant that started as an online bookstore. It has expanded into various sectors, including AI, streaming, and logistics.
Facebook, now Meta Platforms, is a social media company that connects people worldwide. It also owns Instagram, WhatsApp, and Oculus VR.
Tesla, Inc. specializes in electric vehicles, energy storage solutions, and solar energy products. It aims to accelerate the world's transition to sustainable energy.
IBM (International Business Machines Corporation) offers computer hardware, software, and consulting services. It has a rich history in pioneering computing technology.
Samsung is a South Korean multinational conglomerate that produces electronics, appliances, and semiconductors. It's a leader in smartphones and televisions.
Toyota is a Japanese automotive manufacturer known for its reliable and fuel-efficient vehicles. It is also a pioneer in hybrid and hydrogen fuel cell technologies.
Coca-Cola is a global beverage company known for its flagship soft drink, Coca-Cola. It offers a wide range of non-alcoholic beverages worldwide.
Nike, Inc. is a leading sportswear company that designs, manufactures, and markets footwear, apparel, and accessories. It is known for its innovation and brand strength.
The Walt Disney Company is a diversified entertainment conglomerate. It operates theme parks, movie studios, and television networks, creating iconic characters and stories.
McDonald's is the world's largest fast-food chain, serving hamburgers, fries, and other items. It operates in over 100 countries, offering quick service meals.
Intel Corporation is a leading semiconductor manufacturer that designs and builds essential technologies for computing devices, including microprocessors.
Sony Corporation is a Japanese multinational conglomerate with interests in electronics, gaming, entertainment, and financial services. It is known for its innovation in consumer electronics.
Volkswagen Group is a German automotive manufacturer that produces vehicles under various brands, including Volkswagen, Audi, and Porsche. It is one of the world's largest car makers.
Pfizer is a global pharmaceutical company that develops and produces medicines and vaccines. It is known for its innovation in healthcare and research.
Adidas is a German multinational corporation that designs and manufactures sports shoes, clothing, and accessories. It is known for its quality and innovation in sportswear.
Oracle Corporation is a multinational computer technology company specializing in database software, cloud solutions, and enterprise software products.
Netflix is a streaming service that offers a vast library of movies, TV shows, and original content. It has transformed the way people consume entertainment.
